name: Celestial Bond: Five of Wands
description:
FIVE OF WANDS is the third chapter, and fourth installment, of the Celestial Bond series.  Play the previous chapters for a better understanding of the story!

[IN DEVELOPMENT]

A war is about to start again in the Exoginos galaxy, and Luna and her friends have to stop it by any means. Sorry the synopsis is short, but I can't write anything else without spoiling the story lolol.

☆ CREDITS ☆

  • story + art: Selenity
  • music: Supersaiyannightwing

Want the story to continue? Consider supporting me on Ko-Fi ;) You can follow the development on the games on my devlog!

*Katharos and Amaritian are an original alien species by Selenity.
